attributes.action: Road Tax us More as it will mean we have better ozone above the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you are aware the cost of road tax is going to increase over the next few years. It is going to help the enviroment in so many different ways & change our attitude to "the car" Please support our goverment in policy for the greater good of our world. If we pay a little now it will repay us & our children in the future. That is of course if we pay the taxes directly to our Gods. Please sign below if you believe that our goverment is correct to make us pay & lead us to believe it will help the enviroment in the UK. As we are such a small piece of this planet & it is a global problem .
